message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a new regularization-based continual learning algorithm that builds upon the Bayesian learning framework and introduces a notion of "uncertainty" for each hidden node in the network. The algorithm is evaluated on both supervised learning and reinforcement learning benchmarks. Based on this description, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.CV (Computer Vision), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), and cs.CL (Computation and Language).
